description:
Шукав переглядач зображень на зразок FS ImageViewer.
Знайшов КОКО. Поки задоволений.
Переглядач легкий, зручний. Зрозумілий інтерфейс.
Шкода що мало людей про нього знають.
Was looking for image viewer to replace FSImageViewer.
Found KOKO. Satisfied for now.
KOKO is lightweight, formidable and with great interface.
It's a shame that KOKO is not wide known.
Nice app, but there should be option show every picture from folders..

As simply a 'viewer' and basic 'editor' it's fine. But, it can't organize your images, which is a huge bummer. You also can simply "copy" a file and past those results into Dolphin somewhere else or into an SMS message.

If this continues to improve it will be towards a 5-star rating for sure!

1. Need the ability to organize files.
2. Needs basic copy and past and interaction with other non-Plasma applications.
3. Exif data stripping/editing needs to be a feature.

For now I'm going to give this a 3-star rating, but that's more like 3+ because there's some very useful features a program like this needs that are simply lacking. For now Dolphin is a better option than Koko, plus a lightweight image editor.
Just what I needed. Quick and simple to use photo viewer. Also offers basic editing capabilties.
fluid and as described carry on
Andaba buscado algo así para Linux !! El primero va bien a la primera de bajarlo y tiene la calidad para darle 5 estrellas.. Muchas gracias !!
summary: Fantástico el primero va bien a la primera !!

description: При нажатии на ярлык не че не происходит.
